text.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE' 
AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}')
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] VALUES ('@{pipeline().Pipeline}','@{pipeline().RunId}','@{utcNow('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_source_table}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_sink_table}')
END
ELSE
BEGIN
create table [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] (
pipeline_name varchar(max),
pipeline_id varchar(max),
run_date datetime,
source_table varchar(max),
sink_table varchar(max)
)
INSERT INTO [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] VALUES ('@{pipeline().Pipeline}','@{pipeline().RunId}','@{utcNow('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_source_table}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_sink_table}')
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE' 
AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}')
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] VALUES ('@{pipeline().Pipeline}','@{pipeline().RunId}','@{utcNow('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_source_table}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_sink_table}')
END
ELSE
BEGIN
create table [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] (
pipeline_name varchar(max),
pipeline_id varchar(max),
run_date datetime,
source_table varchar(max),
sink_table varchar(max)
)
INSERT INTO [@{pipeline().parameters.pl_log_table}] VALUES ('@{pipeline().Pipeline}','@{pipeline().RunId}','@{utcNow('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_source_table}','@{pipeline().parameters.pl_sink_table}')
END

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT dt.[ProductID],dt.[SalesOrderID],dt.[OrderQty],dt.[UnitPrice],hd.[OrderDate],hd.[CustomerID],hd.[TaxAmt]
  FROM [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] dt
  LEFT JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] hd
  ON dt.[SalesOrderID]=hd.[SalesOrderID]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select TABLE_NAME as tableName, TABLE_SCHEMA as tableSchema from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
